name: 100Billionth
description:
As 100 billionth death, you will be god for as long as you last. Drag your abilities onto matching (affectable) crimes to hold chaos rate low as possible. 

I highly recommend you to play fullscreen. If something does not work properly you can download PC version too. This game made solo for GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam! in 10 days. (I actually made in 4) THE THEME IS: DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING!

The free asset list i used (i named them way i use):

  1. Map Pack
  2. Flood SFX
  3. Wind SFX
  4. Thunder SFX
  5. Earthquake SFX
  6. Background Music
  7. Between Text SFX
  8. Pistol Cock SFX
  9. Pistol Shot SFX
  10. Molestation Icon
  11. Drug Deal Icon
  12. Chaos Icon
  13. Terror Icon
  14. Hurricane Icon
  15. Earthquake Icon
  16. Ufo Icon
  17. Robbery Icon
  18. Flood Icon
  19. Murder Icon
  20. Lightning Icon
  21. Genocide Icon
  22. Civil War Icon
